column1: Successors: The Battles for Alexander's Empire (First/Second Edition)
Campaign / Battle Card Driven, Dice Rolling, Point to Point Movement

Following in the footsteps of the successful card driven war game systems of We the People and Hannibal: Rome vs. Carthage, Successors adds a new element in adding a multi-player dimension to the series. Players are the generals under the recently deceased Alexander the Great and recreate the civil war within the Hellenistic sphere of the middle east.
